turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I was looking to order four large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two from pepperoni, one bacon and mushroom and one Hawaiian.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I like all of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large pizzas with extra cheese, 2 pepperoni, 1 bacon and mushroom, and 1 hawaiin, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $100, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
